summary: A TES5Edit script to generate encounter zones for interior cells without one so that you can de-level Skyrim easily. To be used with WTF-Random Encounter Zones and another script to copy min level to max level entries.
descriptionHtml:
A TES5Edit script to generate encounter zones for interior cells without one so that you can de-level Skyrim easily. To be used with WTF-Random Encounter Zones and another script to copy min level to max level entries.

Note: Please name the new file NewEncounterZones so you can update it later if you wish by applying the script again.

Link to WTF-Random Encounter Zone:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28761/?

0.99 fixed all of the known issues. And now it also imports world cells.
You should be able to create a world with absolutely no level scaling based on your character from now on :D
author: me
